reviews.sentence: Pool was nice but water was not very heated. Breakfast was nice. Floor in room was horrible. Bed was old and uncomfortable. They booked me for a room with 2 beds but sold it out from under me so my 3 kids had to all sleep in one bed with me.

Very good. The staff was wonderful the pools were the best part about the resort as they were a great size for the size of the resort. very well cleaned and maintained. the room was adequate for the price point of the hotel. The hotel had lovely grounds with Palm trees and plants. The only downfall was the carpets could have been updated as well as a new modern flatscren TV would have made a big difference as well.

Not again. To start with there was no wifi access and I was attending a tech conference. My room had a musty smell to it. There were two of us sharing a room so we had only two towels. This might have been ok except the bath towels are not the size of normal bath towels. The breakfast in the morning is barely a continental breakfast. The apples had multiple bruises. I have no idea about the bananas because I was down there at 7 am and the bananas were all gone. The breakfast opens at 630The pool area was very nice. The group I was with was able to sit out there and talk. It was much more comfortable out there than in the musty room with the hard bed.

Very uncomfortable and dirty rooms. You have to go to the front desk to get towels for the pool. The pool area is the only thing I liked. It was perfect for my young children. I did not like the room that was provided the beds where as hard as a board the carpet was filthy bathroom was just disgusting. the shower and the toilet looked like they had not been cleaned in months. I tried to upgrade but was told they were booked for the weekend. They tried to give me another guest room and was told it was much cleaner. It took my sister whom I accompanied to her weekend getaway to call and speak to the manager to move me to another room. I would never want to stay at this facility again. it is very outdated needs some major repairs and remodeling.
Fun girls trip. Great breakfast Great customer service and great location. Hard towels in room.

“ I will never return to the ivy in palm springs ”. It was a nice hotel. The lady was rude. Very rude. She asked me why I wanted a room which I do not feel it Was her biz. Then she refused me a room cuz I did not have credit card. Not even to just hold it and let me pay cash. And she treated me like a damn idiot. Straight up snooty. I will never return.
It was good and comfortable. Room size and cozy atmosphere here. Kind personal. Old towels and old TV.

Good. Toilet kept running. Lights did not work. Rubber underneath the door entrance was not there. I worked at a Mariot for a long time. Maintenance is a must there but I think management is not doing their job by just taking a few minutes to inspect the rooms from time to time. Location is great. Your Hotel is beautiful. Just needs attention.
Exceptional. I came to visit family and this was the perfect location. I requested a ground floor room but one was not a available when I checked in.

Great staff but needs an update. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful always asking if I needed anything or how my stay was. The room I stayed in could have used some updating the carpet was pieced together under the sink where it looks like the changed out the counter vanity the outlets seemed loose and plugs would fall out without even touching them one outlet sparked when I plugged in a phone charger and the comforter on the bed was very thing. Granted the weather this past weekend was unseasonably chilly I was glad the heater was available. On a similar note I went to use the spa hot tub and only one was at least warm neither were a typical temperature.

do not go there. We could not stay at the hotel because it was so unpleasant the pool was dirty that the kids even were disgusted by it. So sad that this hotel does not take care of the cleanliness of the hotel and sell the rooms for such a high prize.

If the pool was cleaned up and maintained I would recommend this hotel for the rooms. Beds were comfortable and room was very clean. The pool water was green in heated pool only tiles were cracked and corroded algae on pool steps and wooden cabana beds were severely splintered.

My children and I checked in on Friday. The imagine on Orbitz looked nothing like the room I received when I checked in. I was disgusted and disappointed by the way the room looked. There were ants and spiders on the floor. The room looked very old. Front desk one man in particular was very friendly and understanding. I had explained what I had seen and he accommodated us to a suite king size bed with its own balcony. It was much better than the first room. The free breakfast was very simple. Oatmeal cereal muffins Bagels fruit coffee milk and water very plain. The main lobby and dining area was all in one room. I felt as though I was eating at a clinic. On the second day of sleeping in a suite I woke up to a moving noise in between the walls. It was very disturbing. Overall it was an experience. I appreciate the staff. I am not sure I would be visiting there ever again. However the hotel needs an upgrade.
The pool area was nice continental breakfast good. Location is awesomeWe got one of the older rooms. They were n’t dirty but very musty. Just smelled old.

The Ivy was under quite extensive renovations during our stay but you ’d really never know it. the staff was on their hospitality “ A ” game that I felt immediately at home and so did my travel partner. Everything was very zen full calm and clean. There was ZERO construction noise but it looks like their plans will just make it even more lovely than it already is. continental breakfast was by far one of my favorites I ’ve ever had. no sloppy waffles n greasy eggs bacon or sausage but yet a very CLEAN eating variety which was EXTREMELY refreshing for change. hard boiled eggs one of my favs mainly a keto girl. English muffins yummy bagels yogurt fruit a managerie of other tasty items along with juice coffee or milk. The gentlemen came to clean our room since check out was at 10 but the door showed 120 so he never skipped a beat nor made a big deal out of it simply said okay noon it is then since they did n’t remove the placard. I will always be a customer here. we were very comfortable felt safe and mainly able to feel RELAXED.

Ivy Palm Resort. Adequate rooms. I like the sink outside of the bath area. Good service at the desk. It was a holiday weekend and at least one guy was overworked and still stayed extremely pleasant. Continental breakfast. GREAT POOL actually 2 pools and hot tubs.

Now that this place is under new management. Its FAR better than it was. This is now a place where I would bring my family. They have cleaned everything up new bedding new towels new carpets and TVs MUCH BETTER.
Like the facility but needs updating in rooms. Room could use new carpet and new mattress. Air conditioner needs new filter. It had a musty odor.

Lucky find at last minute. Made a last minute decision to go to Palm Springs. This hotel is located right at the entrance of the city and within a mile to the main strip of shops and restaurants. I did not interact with the staff after check in but the front desk staff was quick and efficient. They offered several local features and events to see. I have three negative small notes. First they do not have enough parking spaces for every room and some spaces are smaller which will not help if you have a larger vehicle. Second any hotel that offers a free breakfast deserves a plus points. I personally would like more warm food items besides just oatmeal. Third there was a dead insect in the bathroom. It obviously died after the room was cleaned. My only real complaint is that the wifi never worked.

Good. The pool area and game room was very nice. The room was a good size it had a mini fridge and a very nice flat screen tvthe room had bathrooms that were outdate and old smell. The pillows where very old and uncomfortable and also the mattresses where very hard. the continental breakfast was very limited.
Great place needs and will get some love soon. Great location and comfortable room. The hotel in general needs some work and they are upgrading and updating it in the coming year.
Great service beautiful views just outside of our room. Hotub and heated pool were perfect even on a rainy day.
Close to downtown. Great location clean rooms.

We would stay here again. The price was right for what it is. Staff was very helpful and friendly. It has a very large outdoor area with 2 pools and 2 hot tubs. The pool was heated and very warm even on a cloudy day. The bad. Rooms were very outdated with ripped carpet and and old bathrooms and outdated furniture. It was clean but felt a bit grungy. The pool area was sorta half taken care of with tiles missing in the hot tub and concrete chipping up in the pool. The continental breakfast did not have great selection compared to some others we have stayed at but was nice to have the option anyway. Would stay again if price stayed the same but definitly not a five star.

Nice place to stay during Modernism week. My girlfriend and I traveled up to Palm Springs to attend two events during Modernism week. The weather had been terrible before we arrived but it improved during our weekend. We arrived early and were told that only one of the two rooms we had reserved was ready so we put our bags in that room and went shopping. When we returned the other room was ready. The rooms are large and super clean. I usually prefer showers to taking baths in hotels but the tub sparkled so I indulged. The bath was wonderful. The bed was very comfortable and there was a fridge to keep snacks cold. The next morning we had breakfast in their large and cheerful lobby. There were plenty of choices for a hearty breakfast. The location is perfectly situated in Palm Springs I would not hesitate to stay at the Ivy Palm again.

central location. Noisy room if on Palm Canyon drive. Pools not really clean and not heated and at night the lights were not on thus very dark with only lights in pools. Bathroom and room OK and rooms are going to be renovated soon. Breakfast basic bagels muffins cereal juice fruit and coffee ok for kids. It is very clear hotel is ready to be renovated and it needs it. Free internet and TV and staff at desk was very friendly.

Perfect weekend getaway. Normally we would have stayed here for 3 nights from Sunday to Wednesday but due to a delayed flight we had to cancel the first night on Sunday. The man at the front desk was very friendly and told us that it was no problem at all. When we arrived tired because of the delayed flight we immediately got our key room so we were able to drop our bagage and take a showerthere is a continental breakfast donuts pastry bagels toast yoghurt cereals coffee tea orange juice milk. There are 2 pools outside. One of them is heated the other not. Also there are 2 hotubs. During our stay there was only one working hotub the other did not work. The room was nice and clean. Value for the money.
Dated rooms but good service. Outdoor pool area is very nice however the room was very dated. Old furniture old carpet and the mattress was hard.
